csdl.jupiter.ui.marker
Class MarkerResourceChangeListener

java.lang.Object
  csdl.jupiter.ui.marker.MarkerResourceChangeListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, org.eclipse.core.resources.IResourceChangeListener, org.eclipse.core.resources.IResourceDeltaVisitor
public class MarkerResourceChangeListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.eclipse.core.resources.IResourceChangeListener, org.eclipse.core.resources.IResourceDeltaVisitor

Provides the resource change listener to check whether markers are moved along with the text document modification.

Version:
$Id: MarkerResourceChangeListener.java,v 1.1 2005/03/26 07:13:36 takuyay Exp $
Author:
Takuya Yamashita

 void resourceChanged(org.eclipse.core.resources.IResourceChangeEvent event)
          Implements resource delta for the active file and accepts the implementing resource data visitor to check the marker change associating with the resource change.
 boolean visit(org.eclipse.core.resources.IResourceDelta delta)
          Implements marker delta to check which markers are changed and retrieve the new line number and set it to the ReviewIssue instance in the ReviewIssueModel.

Constructor Detail

MarkerResourceChangeListener

public MarkerResourceChangeListener()
Method Detail

resourceChanged

public void resourceChanged(org.eclipse.core.resources.IResourceChangeEvent event)
Implements resource delta for the active file and accepts the implementing resource data visitor to check the marker change associating with the resource change. This method is called by platform when resources are changed.

Specified by:
resourceChanged in interface org.eclipse.core.resources.IResourceChangeListener
Parameters:
event - A resource change event to describe changes to resources.

visit

public boolean visit(org.eclipse.core.resources.IResourceDelta delta)
              throws org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
Implements marker delta to check which markers are changed and retrieve the new line number and set it to the ReviewIssue instance in the ReviewIssueModel. This method is called by EclipseSensorPlugin instance. Note that true is returned if the parameter of IResourceDelta instance has children.

Specified by:
visit in interface org.eclipse.core.resources.IResourceDeltaVisitor
Parameters:
delta - IResourceDelta instance to contains delta resource.
Returns:
true if the resource delta's children should be visited; false if they should be skipped.
Throws:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException - if this method fails. Reasons include:
  • This marker does not exist.
